question: What are the names of mentioned capital improvement projects?
raw_answer: City Hall Roof Replacement, Storm Drainage Improvement Project, PCH Signal Synchronization System Improvements Project.
evidence_answer: City Hall Roof Replacement, Broad Beach Road Water Quality Infrastructure Repairs, Annual Street Maintenance, Storm Drain Trash Screens, PCH Median Improvements Project, Civic Center Stormwater Diversion Structure, Malibu Park Drainage Improvements
